s0442: Xiang Yu was angry, boiled Zhou Ke, beheaded Song Gong.
s0443: Han King left Xingyang, fled south to Wan and Ye, got Jiujiang King Bu, marching gathered troops, re-entered and defended Chenggao.
s0444: Han fourth year, Xiang Yu advanced troops to besiege Chenggao.
s0445: Han King fled, alone with Teng Gong left Chenggao north gate, crossed river fled to Xiuwu, joined Zhang Er and Han Xin army.
s0446: The generals gradually escaped from Chenggao, followed Han King.
s0447: Chu then took Chenggao, wished to go west.
s0448: Han sent troops to resist at Gong, prevented them from going west.
s0449: At this time, Peng Yue crossed river attacked Chu Dong'a, killed Chu general Xue Gong.
s0450: Xiang Yu then personally attacked Peng Yue east.
s0451: Han King got Huaiyin Hou troops, wished to cross south of Yellow River.
s0452: Zheng Zhong advised Han King, then stopped and camped in Henan.
s0453: Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue, defeated him, returned west.
s0454: Han King attacked Xiang Yu at Guling, Xiang Yu retreated.
s0455: Han King followed to Guangwu, camped at Xiaohe.
s0456: Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe, Han King retreated.
s0457: Xiang Yu pursued to Henei, Han King retreated to Yongqiu.
s0458: Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu, Han King retreated to Chenliu.
s0459: Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu, Han King retreated to Xingyang.
s0460: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang, Han King retreated through Xiaopi.
s0461: Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth, Han King retreated to Henei.
s0462: Xiang Yu attacked Henei, Han King retreated to Pingcheng.
s0463: Han King sent Guo Ji to negotiate peace, Xiang Yu agreed.
s0464: Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Han King camped at Xiaohe.
s0465: Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again.
s0466: Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again.
s0467: Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again.
s0468: Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again.
s0469: Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.'
s0470: Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again.
s0471: Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu, Han King camped at Xiaohe again.
s0472: Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again.
